text:
Rho AI | Senior Software Engineer | Remote (US Only) | Full-time | http://www.rho.ai/

Rho AI builds customized data science products and services to solve real-world problems, and we're hiring! Founded in 2012 by a team of entrepreneurs, data scientists and PhDs focused on predictive modeling in professional motorsports, Rho AI has grown to become a leader in the field of data science and serves partners spanning a variety of channels and industries.

We are looking for a motivated software engineer who is excited to work across our full stack and have a major impact in the direction of our products. See our job posting for more details (http://rho.ai/careers/senior-software-engineer-2)
